tool_description: Generate QR Codes by passing in parameters.
name: QR Code API_v119
title: QR Code API

api_list.name: QR Code API (Web URL)
api_list.description: Call the API Endpoint /qr and pass in the url parameter along with your rapidApi key to obtain a QR Code.

optional_parameters.name: logo
optional_parameters.description:
[Optional] URL to logo which will be placed at the center of the QR Code.
Logo URL must be in .png
